bbq.dashcfg.yaml:
layout:
  autoReflow: single
  small:
    columns:
      - - bbq
  medium:
    columns:
      - - bbq
  large:
    columns:
      - - bbq
  xlarge:
    columns:
      - - bbq
cards:
  - id: bbq
    title: BBQ
    icon: fas/fa-fire
    type: conditional
    config:
      property: nanobbqv3/maintenance/reachable
      condition: "true"
    items:
      - type: bbq
        config:
          device: nanobbqv3
control.dashcfg.yaml:
layout:
  autoReflow: single
  small:
    columns:
      - - general-info
  large:
    columns:
      - - general-info
      - []
      - []
  xlarge:
    columns:
      - - general-info
      - []
      - []
      - []

cards:
  - id: general-info
    type: default
    items:
      - type: clock
      - type: simpleSensor
        label: Aussentemperatur
        mappings:
          primarySensor: meq1601978/weather/temperature
          secondarySensor: meq1601978/weather/humidity
      # - type: dualSensorBig
      #   mappings:
      #     bigSensorreading: meq1601978/weather/temperature
      #     smallSensorreading: meq1601978/weather/humidity
      - type: group
        items:
          - type: tilt
            device: leq1284308
            label: Garagentor
            config:
              size: medium
          - type: pushButton
            label: ▲ Tor auf / zu ▼
            mappings:
              target: grg-garagentor/activate/action
            config:
              setState: press
              wide: true
          - type: graph
            label: Temperatur und Luftfeuche
            config:
              hideRangePicker: false
              rangePickerConfig:
                style: 'extended'
                defaultRange: 
                  label: 1week
                  range: 
                    start: 1634518800
                  aggregateWindow: 4h
                  showDate: true

              size: medium
              refreshInterval: 10
              graphDefs:
                - title: Garten (1week)
                  yAxis:
                  - id: temp
                    position: left
                    suggestedMin: -5
                    suggestedMax: 50
                    label: Temperature
                  - id: hum
                    position: right
                    suggestedMin: 0
                    suggestedMax: 90
                    label: Luftfeuchtigkeit
                  measurements:
                  - yAxisId: temp
                    label: Temperatur
                    measurement: meq1601978/weather/temperature
                  - yAxisId: temp
                    label: Temperatur
                    measurement: meq0180941/weather/temperature
                  - yAxisId: temp
                    label: Temperatur
                    measurement: neq0937510/weather/temperature
                  - yAxisId: hum
                    label: Luftfeuchtigkeit
                    measurement: meq1601978/weather/humidity
                - title: Garten2 (1week)
                  yAxis:
                  - id: temp
                    position: left
                    suggestedMin: -5
                    suggestedMax: 50
                    label: Temperature
                  - id: hum
                    position: right
                    suggestedMin: 0
                    suggestedMax: 90
                    label: Luftfeuchtigkeit
                  measurements:
                  - yAxisId: temp
                    label: Temperatur
                    measurement: meq1601978/weather/temperature
                  - yAxisId: temp
                    label: Temperatur
                    measurement: meq0180941/weather/temperature
                  - yAxisId: temp
                    label: Temperatur
                    measurement: neq0937510/weather/temperature
                  - yAxisId: hum
                    label: Luftfeuchtigkeit
                    measurement: meq1601978/weather/humidity
          - type: graph
            label: Temperatur und Luftfeuche
            config:
              size: medium
              refreshInterval: 10
              rangePickerConfig:
                style: 'simple'
                defaultRange: 1
                ranges:
                  - label: 1 week
                    range:
                      start: -1w
                    aggregateWindow: 15m
                  - label: 1 day
                    range:
                      start: -1d
                    aggregateWindow: 30m
                  - label: half day
                    range:
                      start: -12h
                    aggregateWindow: 1m

              graphDefs:
                - title: Garten
                  yAxis:
                  - id: temp
                    position: left
                    suggestedMin: -10
                    suggestedMax: 35
                  - id: hum
                    position: right
                    suggestedMin: 30
                    suggestedMax: 90
                  measurements:
                  - yAxisId: temp
                    label: Temperatur
                    measurement: meq1601978/weather/temperature
                  - yAxisId: hum
                    label: Luftfeuchtigkeit
                    measurement: meq1601978/weather/humidity

      - type: group
        label: Offene Fenster und Türen
        items:
          - type: conditional
            config:
              condition: "false"
              property: sec-contacts-except-door/contact/state
            items:
              - type: contact
                device: sec-contacts-except-door
                label: Alle Fenster und Türen geschlossen
                config:
                  size: medium
          - type: conditional
            config:
              condition: "true"
              property: sec-contacts-except-door/contact/state
            items:
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: oeq2132384/contact/state
              items:
                  - type: contact
                    device: oeq2132384
                    label: Wohnungstür
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: meq0753110/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: meq0753110
                  label: Kinderzimmer Fenster
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: meq0753061/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: meq0753061
                  label: Schlafzimmer Fenster
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: oeq0429971/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq0429971
                  label: Küche Fenster
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: meq0753071/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: meq0753071
                  label: Esszimmer Fenster
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: oeq2132349/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq2132349
                  label: Terassentür
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: meq0753104/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: meq0753104
                  label: Wohnzimmer Fenster
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: oeq0429851/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq0429851
                  label: Bad Fenster
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: oeq0431016/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq0431016
                  label: Gästezimmer Fenster
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: req0227787/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: req0227787
                  label: Gästetoilette Fenster
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: oeq0706059/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq0706059
                  label: Werkstatt Fenster
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: oeq0706161/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq0706161
                  label: Werkstatt Tür
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: oeq0706187/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq0706187
                  label: Büro Fenster
      - type: verticalStack
        items:  
          - type: group
            label: Alarmanlage
            items:
              - type: onoff
                label: Alarm
                mappings:
                  state: security/alarm/state
                config:
                  size: large
              - type: toggleButton
                label: Alarmanlage aktiv
                mappings:
                  switch: security/armed/state
              - type: switch
                label: Alarmanlage AUTO
                mappings:
                  switch: security/auto-arm/state
              - type: pushButton
                label: Reset Alarm
                mappings:
                  target: security/alarm/state
                config:
                  setState: "false"
                  icon: clear
          - type: group
            label: Sensorstatus
            items:
              - type: presence
                label: Anwesenheit
                mappings:
                  state: security-presence-all/switch/state
              - type: contact
                device: sec-contacts
                label: Aussenhaut
              - type: onoff
                label: Bewegung
                mappings:
                  state: security-indoor-motion/motion/motion
              - type: onoff
                label: Sensorenalarm
                mappings:
                  state: security/sensor-alarm/state
devices.dashcfg.yaml:
layout:

  xlarge:

cards:
  - id: general-info
    type: default
    items:
      - type: clock
      - type: simpleSensor
        label: Aussentemperatur
        mappings:
          primarySensor: meq1601978/weather/temperature
          secondarySensor: meq1601978/weather/humidity

      #     smallSensorreading: meq1601978/weather/humidity
      - type: group
        items:
          - type: tilt
            device: leq1284308
            label: Garagentor
            config:
              size: medium
          - type: pushButton
            label: ▲ Tor auf / zu ▼
            mappings:

            config:
              setState: press
              wide: true
          - type: graph
            label: Temperatur und Luftfeuche
            config:
              hideRangePicker: false
              rangePickerConfig:
                style: 'extended'
                defaultRange: 
                  label: 1week
                  range: 
                    start: 1634518800
                  aggregateWindow: 4h
                  showDate: true

              size: medium
              refreshInterval: 10
              graphDefs:
                - title: Garten (1week)
                  yAxis:
                  - id: temp

                    label: Temperature
                  - id: hum

                  - yAxisId: hum

                - title: Garten2 (1week)

                    suggestedMax: 50
                    label: Temperature
                  - id: hum
                    position: right
                    suggestedMin: 0
                    suggestedMax: 90
                    label: Luftfeuchtigkeit
                  measurements:

                    label: Temperatur
                    measurement: meq1601978/weather/temperature
                  - yAxisId: temp
                    label: Temperatur
                    measurement: meq0180941/weather/temperature
                  - yAxisId: temp
                    label: Temperatur
                    measurement: neq0937510/weather/temperature
                  - yAxisId: hum
                    label: Luftfeuchtigkeit
                    measurement: meq1601978/weather/humidity
          - type: graph
            label: Temperatur und Luftfeuche

                      start: -1w

                    range:
                      start: -1d
                    aggregateWindow: 30m
                  - label: half day
                    range:
                      start: -12h
                    aggregateWindow: 1m

              graphDefs:
                - title: Garten
                  yAxis:
                  - id: temp
                    position: left
                    suggestedMin: -10
                    suggestedMax: 35
                  - id: hum
                    position: right
                    suggestedMin: 30
                    suggestedMax: 90
                  measurements:
                  - yAxisId: temp
                    label: Temperatur
                    measurement: meq1601978/weather/temperature
                  - yAxisId: hum
                    label: Luftfeuchtigkeit
                    measurement: meq1601978/weather/humidity

      - type: group
        label: Offene Fenster und Türen
        items:
          - type: conditional
            config:
              condition: "false"
              property: sec-contacts-except-door/contact/state
            items:

                  size: medium
          - type: conditional

              condition: "true"

            - type: conditional

                condition: "true"
                property: oeq2132384/contact/state
              items:
                  - type: contact
                    device: oeq2132384
                    label: Wohnungstür
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: meq0753110/contact/state

                - type: contact

            - type: conditional

                - type: contact

                  label: Schlafzimmer Fenster
            - type: conditional

                - type: contact

            - type: conditional

            - type: conditional
              config:

                - type: contact

            - type: conditional

            - type: conditional

                - type: contact

            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: oeq0706161/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq0706161
                  label: Werkstatt Tür
            - type: conditional

                condition: "true"
                property: oeq0706187/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq0706187

      - type: verticalStack
        items:  
          - type: group

light.dashcfg.yaml:
layout:
  autoReflow: single
  large:
    columns:
      - - test
        - test4
        - test7
      - - test2
        - test5
      - - test3
        - test6
        - test8

cards:
  - id: test
    title: Testcard 2
    type: default
    icon: fas/fa-cloud-sun
    items: []
main.dashcfg.yaml:
layout:
  autoReflow: single
  xlarge:
    columns:
      - - test7
        - clima
        - test7
      - - heating-control
        - clock
        - test
      - - security
        - graphs
        - keller
      - - heating
        - shutters
        - test89
cards:
  - id: heating-control
    type: default
    items:
      - type: group
        label: Zentralsteuerung 567
        items: []

      - type: group
        label: Wohzimmer
        items:
          - type: select
            label: Wochenprogram
            mappings:
              value: meq0180941/hm-config/active-program
            config:
              overrideOptionList: ["0","1","2"]
              optionsLabels: ["winter","sommer","urlaub"]   
          - type: switch
            label: Boost nach Lueften
            mappings:
              switch: meq0180941/hm-config/boost-after-window-open
            config:
              hideIcon: true
          - type: select
            label: Boost-Dauer
            mappings:
              value: meq0180941/hm-config/boost-duration        
      - type: group
        label: Schlafzimmer
        items:
          - type: select
            label: Wochenprogram
            mappings:
              value: neq0937510/hm-config/active-program
            config:
              overrideOptionList: ["0","1","2"]
              optionsLabels: ["winter","sommer","urlaub"]   
          - type: switch
            label: Boost nach Lueften
            mappings:
              switch: neq0937510/hm-config/boost-after-window-open
            config:
              hideIcon: true
          - type: select
            label: Boost-Dauer
            mappings:
              value: neq0937510/hm-config/boost-duration       
      - type: group
        label: Kinderzimmer
        items:
          - type: select
            label: Wochenprogram
            mappings:
              value: meq0478846/hm-config/active-program
            config:
              overrideOptionList: ["0","1","2"]
              optionsLabels: ["winter","sommer","urlaub"]   
          - type: switch
            label: Boost nach Lueften
            mappings:
              switch: meq0478846/hm-config/boost-after-window-open
            config:
              hideIcon: true
          - type: select
            label: Boost-Dauer
            mappings:
              value: meq0478846/hm-config/boost-duration
      - type: group
        label: Bad
        items:
          - type: select
            label: Wochenprogram
            mappings:
              value: oeq0300066/hm-config/active-program
            config:
              overrideOptionList: ["0","1","2"]
              optionsLabels: ["winter","sommer","urlaub"]   
          - type: switch
            label: Boost nach Lueften
            mappings:
              switch: oeq0300066/hm-config/boost-after-window-open
            config:
              hideIcon: true
          - type: select
            label: Boost-Dauer
            mappings:
              value: oeq0300066/hm-config/boost-duration  

  - id: test7
    title: Mediaplayers
    type: default
    launchOptions: 
      wide: true
      pageId: devices.dashcfg
    items:

          - type: mediaplayer
            device: dev-yamaha
            label: Receiver 2
          - type: mediaplayer
            device: echo-g090rf0474130dpe
            label: Echo Wohnzimmer
          - type: mediaplayer
            device: echo-g2a0p30774060lpn
            label: Echo Buero
  - id: test
    title: Wohnbereich
    type: default
    icon: svg/0 0 512 512/M431.36,80.64a248,248,0,0,0-350.72,0c-96.85,96.85-96.85,253.87,0,350.72a248,248,0,0,0,350.72,0C528.21,334.51,528.21,177.49,431.36,80.64ZM397.42,397.42A200,200,0,1,1,114.58,114.58,200,200,0,1,1,397.42,397.42ZM369,143C306.66,80.75,205.34,80.75,143,143A24,24,0,0,0,177,177,111.77,111.77,0,1,1,335,335,24,24,0,1,0,369,369,159.72,159.72,0,0,0,369,143ZM139.55,304.57a16,16,0,0,0-22.63,22.63l67.88,67.88a16,16,0,0,0,22.63-22.63Zm90.51-90.51a16,16,0,0,0-22.63,22.63l67.88,67.88a16,16,0,0,0,22.63-22.63Zm-67.88,22.63a16,16,0,0,0-22.63,22.62L252.69,372.45a16,16,0,0,0,22.62-22.63Z
    items:
      - type: group
        label: Raumsteuerung
        items:
          - type: dimmer
            device: wz-lights
          - type: dimmer
            device: group-4
         
          - type: switch
            device: kue-lights
            config:
              icon: svg/0 0 512 512/M431.36,80.64a248,248,0,0,0-350.72,0c-96.85,96.85-96.85,253.87,0,350.72a248,248,0,0,0,350.72,0C528.21,334.51,528.21,177.49,431.36,80.64ZM397.42,397.42A200,200,0,1,1,114.58,114.58,200,200,0,1,1,397.42,397.42ZM369,143C306.66,80.75,205.34,80.75,143,143A24,24,0,0,0,177,177,111.77,111.77,0,1,1,335,335,24,24,0,1,0,369,369,159.72,159.72,0,0,0,369,143ZM139.55,304.57a16,16,0,0,0-22.63,22.63l67.88,67.88a16,16,0,0,0,22.63-22.63Zm90.51-90.51a16,16,0,0,0-22.63,22.63l67.88,67.88a16,16,0,0,0,22.63-22.63Zm-67.88,22.63a16,16,0,0,0-22.63,22.62L252.69,372.45a16,16,0,0,0,22.62-22.63Z

          - type: lightscene
            label: Szenen Wohnzimmer
            mappings:
              scenes: group-5/scenes/recall
      - type: group
        label: Esszimmer
        items:
          - type: dimmer
            device: group-9
          - type: select
            label: Wohnzimmer window open Boost time
            mappings:
              value: meq0180941/hm-config/boost-duration
          - type: select
            label: Active Week Program
            mappings:
              value: meq0180941/hm-config/active-program
            config:
              overrideOptionList: ["0","1","2"]
              optionsLabels: ["winter this is a looong text","sommer","urlaub"]   
          - type: dimmer
            device: light-13
            label: Licht Esszimmer Schrank
      - type: group
        label: Wohnzimmer
        items:
          - type: dimmer
            device: wz-stehlampe-papier
          - type: dimmer
            device: wz-stehlampe-sofa 
          - type: dimmer
            device: wz-lounge-light 
          - type: pushButton
            label: Werkstatt Licht an/aus
            mappings:
              target: group-4/switch/action
            config:
              setState: "toggle"
              wide: true
          - type: actionButtons
            label: Werkstatt Licht an/aus
            mappings:
              targets:
                - selector: meq0191203/switch/state
                  config:
                    setState: 'false'
                    icon: file_download
                - selector: meq0191203/switch/state
                  config:
                    setState: 'true'
                    size: medium
                    color: accent
                    icon: stop
                - selector: meq0191203/switch/state
                  config:
                    setState: 'false'
                    icon: file_upload
            config:
              hideLabel: false
          - type: status
            label: Status Test
            mappings:
              status: 
                - selector: meq0191203/switch/state
                  config:
                    statusMap:
                      - forValue: true
                        type: icon
                        size: medium
                        color: primary
                        icon: fas/fa-play
                      - forValue: false
                        type: icon
                        size: medium
                        color: accent
                        icon: fas/fa-stop
                - selector: meq0191203/switch/state
                  config:
                    statusMap:
                      - forValue: true
                        type: label
                        size: large
                        toValue: ANGESCHALTET
                        color: primary
                      - forValue: false
                        type: label
                        size: large
                        toValue: AUSGESCHALTET
                        color: accent
          - type: switch
            device: meq0191203
      - type: group
        label: Küche
        items:
          - type: switch
            device: leq0746152
            label: Licht Decke
          - type: switch
            device: meq0191627
            label: LED Arbeitsplatte

  - id: clock
    type: default
    items:
      - type: clock
      - type: toggleButton
        device: group-2
        label: Wohnzimmer
      - type: timer
        label: Echo Wohnzimmer
        config:
          deltaSeconds: 4
        mappings:
            creationTime: echo-g090rf0474130dpe/timers/timer-1-creation-date
            duration: echo-g090rf0474130dpe/timers/timer-1-duration
            label: echo-g090rf0474130dpe/timers/timer-1-label
            status: echo-g090rf0474130dpe/timers/timer-1-status
              # mapping:
              #   in:
              #     - from: 'off'
              #       to: false
              #     - from: 'on'
              #       to: true
              #   out:
              #     - from: false
              #       to: 'off'
              #     - from: true
              #       to: 'on'

      - type: timer
        label: Echo Buero
        config:
          deltaSeconds: 4
        mappings:
            creationTime: echo-g090lf0964840r2h/timers/timer-1-creation-date
            duration: echo-g090lf0964840r2h/timers/timer-1-duration
            label: echo-g090lf0964840r2h/timers/timer-1-label
            status: 
              selector: echo-g090lf0964840r2h/timers/timer-1-status
              # mapping:
              #   in:
              #     - from: 'off'
              #       to: false
              #     - from: 'on'
              #       to: true
              #   out:
              #     - from: false
              #       to: 'off'
              #     - from: true
              #       to: 'on'

  - id: security
    type: default
    icon: home
    title: Sicherheit
    items:
      - type: device-attention
        label: Devices needing attention
        config:
          lowBattery:
            queries:
              - query:
                  node: 
                    type: homie-homecontrol/v1/type=maintenance
                  property: 
                    id: low-battery
                valueCondition: true
              - query:
                  node: 
                    type: homie-homecontrol/v1/type=maintenance
                  property: 
                    id: battery-level
                valueCondition:
                  operator: "<"
                  value: 30
          notReady: 
            queries:
              - query:
                  device:
                    state: 
                      operator: "<>"
                      value: "ready"
            ignoreList:
              - aaa-test-vdev-2
              - dev-auto-ctl-1
              - global-echo-timers-state-dev
              - security-indoor-motion-dev
              - shelly-wrapper-dev
                
          # notRechable: 
          #   queries:
          #     - query:
          #         node: 
          #           type: homie-homecontrol/v1/type=maintenance
          #         property: 
          #           id: reachable
          #       valueCondition: false
          #   ignoreList:
          #     - aaa-test-vdev-2
          #     - light-10
          #     - light-11
          #     - light-2
          #     - light-22
          #     - light-7
          #     - light-8
          #     - light-9
          #     - nanobbqv3
                

      - type: switch
        device: db-general-config
        label: Hide closed contacts

      - type: conditional
        config:
          condition: "true"
          property: db-general-config/contacts-hide-closed/state
        items:
          - type: group
            label: Offene Fenster und Türen
            items:
              - type: conditional
                config:
                  condition: "true"
                  property: meq0753110/contact/state
                items:
                  - type: contact
                    device: meq0753110
                    label: Kinderzimmer Fenster
              - type: conditional
                config:
                  condition: "true"
                  property: meq0753061/contact/state
                items:
                  - type: contact
                    device: meq0753061
                    label: Schlafzimmer Fenster
              - type: conditional
                config:
                  condition: "true"
                  property: oeq0429971/contact/state
                items:
                  - type: contact
                    device: oeq0429971
                    label: Küche Fenster
              - type: conditional
                config:
                  condition: "true"
                  property: meq0753071/contact/state
                items:
                  - type: contact
                    device: meq0753071
                    label: Esszimmer Fenster
              - type: conditional
                config:
                  condition: "true"
                  property: oeq2132349/contact/state
                items:
                  - type: contact
                    device: oeq2132349
                    label: Terassentür
              - type: conditional
                config:
                  condition: "true"
                  property: meq0753104/contact/state
                items:
                  - type: contact
                    device: meq0753104
                    label: Wohnzimmer Fenster
              - type: conditional
                config:
                  condition: "true"
                  property: meq0753104/contact/state
                items:
                  - type: contact
                    device: meq0753104
                    label: Wohnzimmer Fenster
              - type: conditional
                config:
                  condition: "true"
                  property: oeq0429851/contact/state
                items:
                  - type: contact
                    device: oeq0429851
                    label: Bad Fenster
              - type: conditional
                config:
                  condition: "true"
                  property: oeq0431016/contact/state
                items:
                  - type: contact
                    device: oeq0431016
                    label: Gästezimmer Fenster
              - type: conditional
                config:
                  condition: "true"
                  property: req0227787/contact/state
                items:
                  - type: contact
                    device: req0227787
                    label: Gästetoilette Fenster
              - type: conditional
                config:
                  condition: "true"
                  property: oeq0706059/contact/state
                items:
                  - type: contact
                    device: oeq0706059
                    label: Werkstatt Fenster
              - type: conditional
                config:
                  condition: "true"
                  property: oeq0706161/contact/state
                items:
                  - type: contact
                    device: oeq0706161
                    label: Werkstatt Tür
              - type: conditional
                config:
                  condition: "true"
                  property: oeq0706187/contact/state
                items:
                  - type: contact
                    device: oeq0706187
                    label: Büro Fenster
      - type: conditional
        config:
          condition: "false"
          property: db-general-config/contacts-hide-closed/state
        items:
          - type: group
            label: Alle Fenster und Türen
            items:
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq2132384
                  label: Wohnungstür
                - type: contact
                  device: meq0753110
                  label: Kinderzimmer Fenster
                - type: contact
                  device: meq0753061
                  label: Schlafzimmer Fenster
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq0429971
                  label: Küche Fenster
                - type: contact
                  device: meq0753071
                  label: Esszimmer Fenster
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq2132349
                  label: Terassentür
                - type: contact
                  device: meq0753104
                  label: Wohnzimmer Fenster
                - type: contact
                  device: meq0753104
                  label: Wohnzimmer Fenster
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq0429851
                  label: Bad Fenster
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq0431016
                  label: Gästezimmer Fenster
                - type: contact
                  device: req0227787
                  label: Gästetoilette Fenster
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq0706059
                  label: Werkstatt Fenster
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq0706161
                  label: Werkstatt Tür
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq0706187
                  label: Büro Fenster
  - id: clima
    title: Temperatur & Luftfeuchtigkeit
    type: default
    icon: fas/fa-cloud-sun
    launchOptions: 
      # pageId: main.dashcfg
      # wide: false
      cardId: clima
    items:
      - type: tempHumBars
        label: "TTTTTTEEEEEEESSSSSSSSTTTTTT"
        # device: meq1601978
        config:
          hideLabel: false
        mappings:
          temperature: meq1601978/weather/temperature
          humidity: meq1601978/weather/humidity
      - type: tempHumBars
        label: Garten
        mappings:
          temperature: meq1601978/weather/temperature
          humidity: meq1601978/weather/humidity
      - type: verticalStack
        items:
          - type: simpleSensor
            label: Garten
            mappings:
              primarySensor: meq1601978/weather/temperature
            config:
              hideReading: true
          - type: tempHumBars
            mappings:
              temperature: meq1601978/weather/temperature
              humidity: meq1601978/weather/humidity
      - type: dualSensorBig
        mappings:
          bigSensorreading: meq1601978/weather/temperature
          smallSensorreading: meq1601978/weather/humidity

      - type: simpleSensor
        label: Garten
        mappings:
          primarySensor: meq1601978/weather/temperature
        config:
          hideReading: true
          hideLabel: true
      - type: simpleSensor
        label: Wohnzimmer TTEST
        device: meq0180941
        # mappings:
        #   primarySensor: meq0180941/weather/temperature
        #   secondarySensor: meq0180941/weather/humidity
      - type: simpleSensor
        label: Gästezimmer
        mappings:
          primarySensor: leq1257637/weather/temperature
          secondarySensor: leq1257637/weather/humidity
      - type: simpleSensor
        label: Schlafzimmer
        mappings:
          primarySensor: neq0937510/weather/temperature
          secondarySensor: neq0937510/weather/humidity
      - type: simpleSensor
        label: Hausgang
        device: sensor-4
      - type: simpleSensor
        label: Bad
        device: oeq0300066
      - type: simpleSensor
        label: Gästezimmer
        device: leq1257637
      - type: simpleSensor
        label: Werkstatt
        device: leq0868067
      - type: simpleSensor
        label: Keller
        device: leq0122770



  - id: shutters
    title: Rolläden
    type: default
    icon: home
    items:
      - type: rollerShutter
        device: wz-shutter-fenster
        config:
          levels:
            openPosition: 0
            closedPosition: 100 
            halfopenPosition: 32
            blindsPosition: 72

      - type: rollerShutter
        device: wz-shutter-terassentuer
      - type: bbq
        config:
          device: nanobbqv3


  - id: heating
    title: Heizung
    type: default
    icon: fas/fa-temperature-low
    launchOptions: 
      cardId: heating-control
      title: Heizungscenter
    items:
      - type: thermostat
        device: meq0180941
        label: Wohnzimmer
      - type: thermostat
        device: neq0937510
        label: Schlafzimmer
      - type: thermostat
        device: meq0478846
        label: Kinderzimmer
      - type: thermostat
        device: oeq0300066
        label: Bad
      - type: thermostat
        device: meq0449630
        label: Toilette

  - id: graphs
    type: default
    title: Graph Tests
    items:
      - type: graph
        label: Temperatur und Luftfeuche
        config:
          # rangePickerConfig:
          #   style: 'simple'
          #   defaultRange: 
          #     range:
          #       start: -8h
          #     aggregateWindow: 1m
          size: medium
          refreshInterval: 10
          graphDefs:
            - title: Garten
              hideLegend: true
              hideXAxisLabels: true
              yAxis:
              - id: temp
                position: left
              - id: hum
                position: right
              measurements:
              - yAxisId: temp
                label: Temperatur
                measurement: meq1601978/weather/temperature
              - yAxisId: temp
                label: Temperatur
                measurement: meq0180941/weather/temperature
              - yAxisId: temp
                label: Temperatur
                measurement: neq0937510/weather/temperature
              - yAxisId: hum
                label: Luftfeuchtigkeit
                measurement: meq1601978/weather/humidity
  - id: keller
    title: Keller
    type: default
    items:
      - type: graph
        label: Temperatur und Luftfeuche
        config:
          hideRangePicker: true
          # rangePickerConfig:
          #   style: 'extended'
          #   defaultRange: 
          #     label: 2week
          #     range: 
          #       start: -1w
          #     aggregateWindow: 1h
          size: smaller
          refreshInterval: 300
          graphDefs:
            - yAxis:
              - id: temp
                position: left
                suggestedMin: 10
                suggestedMax: 25
              - id: hum
                position: right
                suggestedMin: 52
                suggestedMax: 62
              hideLegend: true
              hideXAxisLabels: true
              hideYAxisLabels: false
              measurements:
              - yAxisId: hum
                label: Luftfeuchtigkeit
                measurement: leq0122770/weather/humidity
              - yAxisId: temp
                label: Temperatur
                measurement: leq0122770/weather/temperature


  - id: hidden1
    type: default
    title: I am hidden normally
    items:
      - type: clock
test2.dashcfg.yaml:
layout:
  autoReflow: single
  small:
    columns:
      - - general-info
  large:
    columns:
      - - general-info
      - []
      - []
  xlarge:
    columns:
      - - general-info
      - []
      - []
      - []

cards:
  - id: general-info
    type: default
    items:
      - type: clock
      - type: simpleSensor
        label: Aussentemperatur
        mappings:
          primarySensor: meq1601978/weather/temperature
          secondarySensor: meq1601978/weather/humidity
      # - type: dualSensorBig
      #   mappings:
      #     bigSensorreading: meq1601978/weather/temperature
      #     smallSensorreading: meq1601978/weather/humidity
      - type: group
        items:
          - type: tilt
            device: leq1284308
            label: Garagentor
            config:
              size: medium
          - type: pushButton
            label: ▲ Tor auf / zu ▼
            mappings:
              target: grg-garagentor/activate/action
            config:
              setState: press
              wide: true
          - type: graph
            label: Temperatur und Luftfeuche
            config:
              hideRangePicker: false
              rangePickerConfig:
                style: 'extended'
                defaultRange: 
                  label: 1week
                  range: 
                    start: 1634518800
                  aggregateWindow: 4h
                  showDate: true

              size: medium
              refreshInterval: 10
              graphDefs:
                - title: Garten (1week)
                  yAxis:
                  - id: temp
                    position: left
                    suggestedMin: -5
                    suggestedMax: 50
                    label: Temperature
                  - id: hum
                    position: right
                    suggestedMin: 0
                    suggestedMax: 90
                    label: Luftfeuchtigkeit
                  measurements:
                  - yAxisId: temp
                    label: Temperatur
                    measurement: meq1601978/weather/temperature
                  - yAxisId: temp
                    label: Temperatur
                    measurement: meq0180941/weather/temperature
                  - yAxisId: temp
                    label: Temperatur
                    measurement: neq0937510/weather/temperature
                  - yAxisId: hum
                    label: Luftfeuchtigkeit
                    measurement: meq1601978/weather/humidity
                - title: Garten2 (1week)
                  yAxis:
                  - id: temp
                    position: left
                    suggestedMin: -5
                    suggestedMax: 50
                    label: Temperature
                  - id: hum
                    position: right
                    suggestedMin: 0
                    suggestedMax: 90
                    label: Luftfeuchtigkeit
                  measurements:
                  - yAxisId: temp
                    label: Temperatur
                    measurement: meq1601978/weather/temperature
                  - yAxisId: temp
                    label: Temperatur
                    measurement: meq0180941/weather/temperature
                  - yAxisId: temp
                    label: Temperatur
                    measurement: neq0937510/weather/temperature
                  - yAxisId: hum
                    label: Luftfeuchtigkeit
                    measurement: meq1601978/weather/humidity
          - type: graph
            label: Temperatur und Luftfeuche
            config:
              size: medium
              refreshInterval: 10
              rangePickerConfig:
                style: 'simple'
                defaultRange: 1
                ranges:
                  - label: 1 week
                    range:
                      start: -1w
                    aggregateWindow: 15m
                  - label: 1 day
                    range:
                      start: -1d
                    aggregateWindow: 30m
                  - label: half day
                    range:
                      start: -12h
                    aggregateWindow: 1m

              graphDefs:
                - title: Garten
                  yAxis:
                  - id: temp
                    position: left
                    suggestedMin: -10
                    suggestedMax: 35
                  - id: hum
                    position: right
                    suggestedMin: 30
                    suggestedMax: 90
                  measurements:
                  - yAxisId: temp
                    label: Temperatur
                    measurement: meq1601978/weather/temperature
                  - yAxisId: hum
                    label: Luftfeuchtigkeit
                    measurement: meq1601978/weather/humidity

      - type: group
        label: Offene Fenster und Türen
        items:
          - type: conditional
            config:
              condition: "false"
              property: sec-contacts-except-door/contact/state
            items:
              - type: contact
                device: sec-contacts-except-door
                label: Alle Fenster und Türen geschlossen
                config:
                  size: medium
          - type: conditional
            config:
              condition: "true"
              property: sec-contacts-except-door/contact/state
            items:
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: oeq2132384/contact/state
              items:
                  - type: contact
                    device: oeq2132384
                    label: Wohnungstür
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: meq0753110/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: meq0753110
                  label: Kinderzimmer Fenster
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: meq0753061/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: meq0753061
                  label: Schlafzimmer Fenster
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: oeq0429971/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq0429971
                  label: Küche Fenster
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: meq0753071/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: meq0753071
                  label: Esszimmer Fenster
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: oeq2132349/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq2132349
                  label: Terassentür
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: meq0753104/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: meq0753104
                  label: Wohnzimmer Fenster
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: oeq0429851/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq0429851
                  label: Bad Fenster
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: oeq0431016/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq0431016
                  label: Gästezimmer Fenster
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: req0227787/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: req0227787
                  label: Gästetoilette Fenster
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: oeq0706059/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq0706059
                  label: Werkstatt Fenster
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: oeq0706161/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq0706161
                  label: Werkstatt Tür
            - type: conditional
              config:
                condition: "true"
                property: oeq0706187/contact/state
              items:
                - type: contact
                  device: oeq0706187
                  label: Büro Fenster
      - type: verticalStack
        items:  
          - type: group
            label: Alarmanlage
            items:
              - type: onoff
                label: Alarm
                mappings:
                  state: security/alarm/state
                config:
                  size: large
              - type: toggleButton
                label: Alarmanlage aktiv
                mappings:
                  switch: security/armed/state
              - type: switch
                label: Alarmanlage AUTO
                mappings:
                  switch: security/auto-arm/state
              - type: pushButton
                label: Reset Alarm
                mappings:
                  target: security/alarm/state
                config:
                  setState: "false"
                  icon: clear
          - type: group
            label: Sensorstatus
            items:
              - type: presence
                label: Anwesenheit
                mappings:
                  state: security-presence-all/switch/state
              - type: contact
                device: sec-contacts
                label: Aussenhaut
              - type: onoff
                label: Bewegung
                mappings:
                  state: security-indoor-motion/motion/motion
              - type: onoff
                label: Sensorenalarm
                mappings:
                  state: security/sensor-alarm/state
